snippet: President Obama urged a group of business leaders to press the House of Representatives to pass broad immigration legislation.
abstract: Pres Obama urges group of business leaders gathered at White House to press House of Representatives to pass broad immigration legislation.
lead_paragraph: President Obama urged a group of business leaders to press the House of Representatives to pass broad immigration legislation.

headline.main: Obama Presses Case for Immigration Changes
headline.print_headline: Obama Presses Case For Immigration Changes
